question: Students should focus on learning in the classroom rather than show their status by wearing fashionable clothes. Therefore all students should wear school uniform.Do you agree or disagree

Some people believe that when students wear various clothes, they can affect another. The main reason for their argument is people began  competing with their clothes. Hence, it can influence their learning concentration.

Taking into account various factors I strongly disagree with this assumption, because I believe that it is an old - fashion idea and if a student has some aims , nothing can impress them.
